name: Tiny TTY
description:
Tiny TTY puts you in the role of a Desmond-from-LOST-like operator, where you have to type the letters on the screen before time runs out. If you lose, be sure to enter your name and submit your score!

Can you reach the highest difficulty level and beat other players from around the world? 

Controls
A-Z - Enter letter
M - Mute/unmute (on the title screen)
Enter - Skip menu screens
Esc - Go back to title (at any point) 
Space - See leaderboard (on the title screen)

Made in 2 weeks by @mauro_oto for LOWREZJAM 2020 using DragonRuby.

Music by @mauro_oto

The game is limited to a resolution of 64x64 as per the rules.
